site.title: Gascoigne Pub
site.description: Craft beers, amazing cocktail and DJ set, all in one place in Palermo

home.title: Gascoigne Pub
home.quote: "I'm going to do things that make me happy. I have always felt that other people are running my life. I don't want that any more."
home.first: <0><1>Gascoigne Pub</1> has been a reference point for discerning customers and music lovers for over ten years.</0>
home.second: Our skilled staff prepares amazing cocktails, a wide selection of craft beers, along with unforgettable events, are the highlights of the venue
home.third: Gascoigne is located at Piazza Teatro Santa Cecilia, 1, in Palermo.
